changes:
* Support perforated surface shadow in shadow mapping.
  * Add `LibreCoop` mod of DOOM3 support, game data directory named `librecoop`.
  * Add `Quake II` support, game data directory named `baseq2`.
  * Add `Quake III Arena` support, game data directory named `baseq3`; Add `Quake III Team Arena` support, game data directory named `missionpack`.
  * Add `Return to Castle Wolfenstein` support, game data directory named `main`.
  * Add `The Dark Mod` 2.11 support, game data directory named `darkmod`.
  * Add a on-screen button theme.
